description: At Gunderson Meadows Campsite at the Two Lakes Rec. Area the trail starts at site 14 which there is a sign. Just follow the trail which can get steep in a couple places. Great views of Two lakes and surrounding mountains.
directions: From Grande Prairie follow highway 40 to the Wapiti bridge then take a right on to secondary 666 follow this road 132 km to Two Lakes.
title: Hat Mountain Trail
